mean_cn: n.自然环境；生活或工作环境
mean_en: the conditions that affect the behaviour and development of somebody/something; the physical conditions that somebody/something exists in; the natural world in which people, animals and plants live
sentence: They are picking up trash to help keep the environment clean.
sentence_trans: 为了保持环境整洁，他们正在捡垃圾。
